channel.title: How do I add shops to a 525?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm having a bit of trouble coding shops in a 525 server. I recently made the switch from 317, to 508. And now I just want to take the coding as hard as I can so I went to a 525. I'm using XX-scape 525 source.
1. I have already tried to help myself. I have looked everywhere from what my experience has taught me. I have looked for "shops" and "shops.xml" I have looked for autospawn. I have looked for Npc(Which I did find.) But I cannot find where to put in shop prices and items and name etc...
2. I am fairly new with 525, however I do have history with html and xml programming, So if you could elaborate a little, it would be much appreciated.
I just need a small tutorial on how add shops.
I know this might be counted as advertising. But this is where I started looking after mopar failed to have the tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/177934-525-adding-donator-admin-shop-525-a.html Sorry if it's advertising. but that tutorial didn't work, it told me to find shops.xml and I don't have it
All help is appreciated!

item.title: How do I add shops to a 525?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I have tried everything this guy tried and I need help with this, I don’t have a shops.xml either? Someone… help… please???

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add shops to a 525?

item.title: How do I add shops to a 525?
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

Hello, I’m having a bit of trouble coding shops in a 525 server. I recently made the switch from 317, to 508. And now I just want to take the coding as hard as I can so I went to a 525. I’m using XX-scape 525 source.

  1. I have already tried to help myself. I have looked everywhere from what my experience has taught me. I have looked for “shops” and “shops.xml” I have looked for autospawn. I have looked for Npc(Which I did find.) But I cannot find where to put in shop prices and items and name etc…

  2. I am fairly new with 525, however I do have history with html and xml programming, So if you could elaborate a little, it would be much appreciated.

I just need a small tutorial on how add shops.

I know this might be counted as advertising. But this is where I started looking after mopar failed to have the tut
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/177934-525-adding-donator-admin-shop-525-a.html
Sorry if it’s advertising. but that tutorial didn’t work, it told me to find shops.xml and I don’t have it

All help is appreciated!

Read full topic
